Summary Heading: Clean, good value and friendly staff
Summary: Opened in August, 2013, this place is just as well kept as when it first opened. Rooms are spacious and well appointed. The staff is friendly, from the front desk to the breakfast servers to housekeeping. They serve a substantial breakfast included in the room charge, with free wifi and free parking. The location is great, with easy access to the freeways. I would stay at this hotel every time I visit Tustin/Irvine.
Manager Response: Many thanks for staying and sharing such positive comments!  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 2 weeks straight and I must say I could have stayed much longer. Great staff, super friendly, good breakfast with all the goodies one need to start a great day, the best workout room and super large with all new equipment. Laundry facility, swimming pool and so much more for a great stay. The place is super clean and quite new, great location off the 55, yet close to the i5 and 405 as well.   Overall, I have nothing bad to say about this place ... will be back again for sure!
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you so much for staying and sharing such wonderful comments!  I hope we get to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is only a few years new, so facilties are spic and span, and well kept. Room decor is pleasant, meaning there actually is some, and it's nicely done, though not elaborate. Location very convenient to Central OC or any surrounding area. Staff pleasant and helpful. Decent breakfast comes with the room. No parking charges, a big plus! A bit pricier than other area options but a good value anyway. Look for specials for the best deal.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing positive feedback!  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Clean hotel with very easy access to freeway. A little on the outskirts of Tustin in an industrial are but it worked out fine.  We would definitely stay there again.  There is a Starbucks in the same parking lot so that was convenient!
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing such wonderful comments!  We look  forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We stayed here to visit family in Huntington Beach.  It was ideally located for easy access to the freeway.  It was clean and felt very new.  It is located in a somewhat industrial area.  I went running in the area, which wasn't the best, lots of stoplights, but it worked.  Very pleased with the friendly staff.  The wifi worked well also.  Complimentary breakfast was pretty typical for a Marriott, but it was adequate for my needs.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying and providing such positive feedback!  We look forward to seeing you again when here visiting family.  Thanks!

Summary Heading: NEW, CLEAN, Great Breakfast, SUPERIOR STAFF, 5 STARS*****
Summary: A Fairfield Inn isn't usually rated a 5 star hotel, but for us, this hotel definitely earned 5 stars. Only 1 1/2 years old, it was still LIKE NEW. Great breakfast with hot oatmeal, eggs and potatoes, fresh fruit and yogurt. REAL FOOD! Nice pool and workout center. As far as the staff goes, you REALLY CAN'T FIND ANY BETTER!! (And we tested them out daily!) Early check in, Late check out. Spilled plate of food in the breakfast area. Free airport shuttle, and MORE UNBELIEVABLE service was offered by housekeeping and the front desk employees at this hotel.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for the 5 stars!  I was happy you enjoyed the hotel, service, and amenities.  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: 5 stars for the hotel, 3.5 stars for the stay..
Summary: Loved the hotel ambiance and staff was very friendly. Good/quick food options right outside too--starbucks, subway, flame broiler. Our room was next to a large group of people who were staying after their prom night. So unfortunately for us, we did not have as restful of an evening as we would have liked. However, I'd still go back and hopefully be placed in a room away from rowdy teenagers.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing your feedback.  I am sorry you encountered noise issues - we hope you come back and give the hotel another chance.  Thanks again for staying and we hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: New stay at a 1 yr old hotel
Summary: Good decent breakfast.  Friendly staff.  1 yr old hotel.  Large bathroom but door opens out  which block room entrance.  Requested connecting rooms but none was available.  My guess is they have very few, if any connecting rooms.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying and sharing your comments!  I am sorry you were not able to get adjoining rooms, as we do have some.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Not only is this the best deal in the area, but the staff and management bent over backwards for us. We arrived a little early, having been on the road quite a bit, and they found our room and got us in. Breakfast was good and solid, the room was clean and quiet, and the overall atmosphere was peaceful. This was what I expected from a Marriott property, and they delivered it all and then some.
Manager Response: Thank you!  What a wonderful review of the hotel!  I was happy that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: When visiting relatives, this is our favorite hotel. Staff believe in customer service. Breaskfat bar can be crowded & refills on food is slow. Nice in hotel shop. Housekeeping is a little slack on exact number of towels. Great sound barrier for interstate traffics noise. Subway & Starbucks within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying and choosing us as your favorite hotel in the area!  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We randomly ended up here on a bike trip.  We booked the rooms on the way into town at 8:00 at night.  Then we extended for two additional nights.  Tustin is a cool town - close to some great trails - had good food and great bike shop.  Our rooms were clean and comfortable - I'd def stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your positive comments!  I was happy to hear that you were able to enjoy Tustin and the bike trails.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights.  The hotel is new and is lovely.  Check-in went easily and I was warmly welcomed.  The beds (2 queen-sized) were comfortable.  One is next to the heater/air-conditioner, which can be problematic for the person sleeping there.  It can get too cold or too warm.  The bathroom is a lovely size with a large stall shower (no tub). The room was above the swimming pool (208) which can be problematic if there are people down there talking at night.  They can be heard. I checked in on Friday night and left the hotel at around 10am on Saturday.  When I returned at 4pm, hoping to relax for a couple of hours, the room had not yet been cleaned.  Although housekeeping came in after I placed a call to the front desk and cleaned the room, it was not the relaxing few
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing such wonderful comments about your stay.  I was happy you enjoyed the room and amenities, and hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels I've ever stayed in
Summary: From the friendly staff to the outstanding room this is one of the best hotels I've ever stayed in.  And it's reasonably priced and convenient to freeways and eating places.  Would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a great stay and a fair price.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for staying with us and sharing such a wonderful review!  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great location close to major highways, nice comfortable rooms. New hotel so you can see some few changes Marriott has made.  Cons: there was no toilet paper in bathroom, bathroom shower drain in metal modern looking but makes loud noise when water hits it.  Overall good stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing your feedback.  We hope we can welcome you back soon!

Summary: We had a room that was booked two weeks in advance, when we got to the hotel to check in we were told that they had overbooked and had to give our room away and there were no rooms available. This was at 4:30 in the afternoon. I could maybe understand if we had shown up very late, but an hour and a half after check in time!! While discussing the problem with desk staff a woman walked in and said she did not have a reservation but needed a room AND THEY GAVE HER ONE! We were willing to take anything they had available but they continued to say " sorry, we are overbooked" I have never dealt with less helpfull staff members and will more than likely stay away from this hotel chain in the future
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your comments regarding our hotel.  At this point, we do not have a record of relocating your reservation, so we would encourage you to contact the hotel directly.  You can reach Oscar Garcia at 714-258-9900, or Oscar.Garcia@Marriott.com.  Thanks!

Summary: The facility is perfect, clean rooms, spacious, nearby restaurants and coffee shops, easy to find, clise to highways, swimming pool, outdoor seating areas, vending machines, and ATM. However, ask rooms that are not facing the highway to avoid the noise. The hote has no 24/7 room service, but has a list of restaurants who deliver.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing such positive comments!  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a week in February on business.  Our California office is a few miles from the hotel.  I've been a Marriott Rewards platinum member for years and have spent more nights in hotels in my life than I can count (well over 1000), so I couldn't wait to see this place that everyone was talking about.  Great reviews and "so nice that they filmed the commercial here!"  I was a little disappointed.  Room was fine, and breakfast selection was broader than I typically see, which was good.  Staff was below average, especially one fellow at the front desk that I had two separate bad experiences with.  Breakfast was not fully set up at the start time (6AM).  Highway noise - even on the "quiet side" was bad.  Noise from the pool was objectionable all the way up on the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments.  I apologize that the hotel and staff did not exceed your expectations, but encouraged to hear that you will return.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We had to make an unexpected trip to California due to a death in our family. We booked two rooms for Feb 8-10-15.  We felt that since Fairfield is part of the Marriott family of hotels and resorts, our accommodations would be more than satisfactory. While we were generally satisfied with our rooms, we were extremely disappointed with the service and the indifference of your staff, including Carlos, who we were told is the supervisor/manager. Upon returning to our room after a hectic and exhausting day of making funeral arrangements and attending services, we returned to a room that had not been cleaned.  The beds were unmade and the towels we used were exactly where we left them. When I called to the front desk to advise them of the situation, I was told they could get me some
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your stay.  I sincerely apologize for the incident that occured with housekeeping, and the resulting frustration you experienced.  If you would like to discuss further, please contact the hotel directly at 714-258-9900.

Summary: Without exception, every member of the Fairfield team we me had a smile and gave us some form of greeting upon eye contact. Our room was a King Suite and had a TV for the bed area and one for the sitting / desk area. The room also had a fridge and microwave. The bathroom had a modern shower and the water pressure was fantastic. Bed was comfortable as were the pillows. Close to the highway but the noise did not bother us at all, although we did have a room that overlooked the pool, on the side away from highway. Breakfast was good and all choices were kept stocked. The hot food was hot and the cold was cold ... just the way it should be. Although we didn't take advantage of it - the hotel does offer an airport shuttle, but I believe there are only certain hours that it runs.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing such a wonderful review!  I was happy to hear you enjoyed the staff service, room, and amenities.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Really nice place. Exercise room is better than most Fairfields. Breakfast is the typical Fairfield fare.The biggest downside is there is no restaurant within walking distance other than fast food. If you like to have a drink in the evening you are out of luck without driving somewhere. I used the Marriott check-in app on my phone and I thought the desk clerk was going to give me a kiss he was so happy. I'm still not sure what the advantage is of checking in online. I don't think Marriott knows either. I'd recommend checking in at the desk so you can ask for an upgraded room, etc.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing such a positive review!  In the future, we hope to have a restaurant move in to the empty retail space next door to the hotel.  Thanks again for staying, and we hope to see you soon!

Summary: On 12/27-30, we stayed at this (new) hotel in Tustin, Calif.  Not only was it noisy ( next to the 55 freeway and under the approach flight path to John Wayne Airport) and the rooms were not cleaned properly.  The full breakfast being served was a disaster!  The breakfast area was inadaquate, with people flowing into the lobby to eat or taking food to their rooms.  The kitchen staff was also completely inadaquate, consisting of 1 cook and 1 attendent to hustle food and cleanup.  I actually felt sorry for her as she couldn't keep up with the demands of the customers.  On each day we were there, they completly ran out of food several times before 9AM.  No eggs, bacon, waffles, yogurt, cereal, juices, or even sweet rolls.  If you were not standing in line next to the serving counter
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments regarding your visit.  I am so sorry for the issues you experienced around breakfast.  Please feel free to contact the hotel directly to discuss further at 714-258-9900.  Thank you, and we hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: Good hotel for travelers on a budget. Location was very close to several businesses in the area. They offered a nice complimentary breakfast including oatmeal, yogurt, fresh fruit, eggs, sausages, and more. Decent fitness center and outdoor firepit were available. Could use some improvement on the amenities in the rooms. Good wifi available.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing such positive comments!  I was happy to hear our location worked well for you - hopefully we can welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great value... Excellent location... Patient Staff!
Summary: This weekend, our boys and girls soccer teams participated in soccer tournaments in the Tustin area.  Team managers for both teams chose the Fairfield Inn & Suites, Tustin, Orange County, location to house the teams for the weekend.   This was a great choice!  This property was located in a central location for the tournament.  As important, at nighttime, this property is located near many great restaurants and shopping locations to pass the time between the games.  If one was not tethered by a soccer tournament schedule... this location would be great for staying at a centralized location from which day trips could be launched to Disneyland... Balboa Island, South Coast Plaza, Newport Beach, Huntington Beach... and other points of interest in Orange County without having to
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such a wonderful and detailed review of your recent stay!  I was happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel and amenities (despite the rain!).  We hope to welcome you back to Tustin soon!

Summary Heading: Nice stay in a new hotel close to John Wayne airport
Summary: We stayed there for 4 nights in January 2015 and highly recommend this hotel.  Pros This is a new hotel and it is modern and very clean. The rooms are fairly standard but the beds were comfortable and we especially liked the large bathroom. Free wi-fi is a nice touch and free printing using the computers in the lobby was useful for printing boarding passes etc. The included breakfast was quite good with ample variety. The dining area was ample and it was easy to find a table every morning. The hotel is within 10 minutes of the John Wayne Airport Cons Although located close to the John Wayne airport and adjacent to the 55 freeway, there is not much in the immediate area in terms of restaurants etc. Thus a car is a must. Overall We stay in this area a couple of times a year while
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us while visiting family in the area.  I was happy you enjoyed the hotel and amenities.  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Upon checking in the front desk staff was terribly rude. In my opinion the evening clerk needs to be retrained in etiquette. For a very tired traveler who had been on the road all day with kids; a simple smile or how was your day would of have been nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your stay.  My apologies for your check-in experience - I hope you can give us another chance when you are back in Tustin.  Thanks!

Summary: This hotel is brand new and is very nice. However, these are some of the rudest people I have ever dealt with. First off, check inn took about 30 minutes because he would not let us check in without our special rate card which we had shown to him. Due to the fact that we booked four rooms he said he need another card. We got the other card and then he was very short with us after that and was a snob. Rooms were very clean and spacious. Breakfast was never stocked and area was very small for such a big hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments.  My apologies for the issues at check-in, and the resulting inconvenience and frustration you experienced.  We hope you can try us again if you travel back to Tustin.  Thanks!

Summary Heading: Car to room was about 1 minute!
Summary: We stayed here (12/8 to 12/10) on our third leg of our California vacation. Tom Tom took us to a dead end road, but Google navigation on the I-Phone got us here in one piece. The hotel is about a year old, everything looks great! It's not much of a 'tourist' area, but you have a Starbucks adjacent in the parking lot, which served us fine as we spent the next 2 days at Disney. We arrived late on Monday, and the great front desk gentleman directed us to a complex called 'the District', about 10 minutes away loaded with restaurants.   The room itself was very 'hip', and new. Loved the glass shower doors, and we really scored with a first floor room. Super-easy access from the rear of the hotel right into the hallway, without the fuss of lobby noise, and the car was a mere steps
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your California vacation!  We hope we can welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Clean and comfortable, ideal for families
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a family trip at Disneyland.  Our party consisted of three toddlers, one teenager and four adults. The free breakfast is a major plus, we had early risers and people who liked to sleep in. Breakfast started at 6am and ended at 9am. Get there early to beat the breakfast rush which usually began at 7:30am. The beds are comfortable, we stayed in a suite so we had an extra sitting area asking with one flat screen tv in the sleeping area and one flat screen tv in the sitting area.  The hotel is new and not to far from Disneyland. There is a Marriott Residence Inn next to this property asking with a Starbucks, Subway sandwich shop and FedEx office.  The hotel is very clean, new and modern, very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us for your family trip to Disneyland!  We hope we can see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Brand new hotel, good for a quiet vacation home base
Summary: Hotel was very clean. Beds were very comfortable. Bathroom was spacious.   We stayed here for two days while visiting Disneyland with my family of four (two adults, two older teenagers).  The hotel seemed to be brand new and was a quiet oasis away from the hubbub of Disneyland. It's a 10-15 easy drive to the Disney parking lot on the I-5. It's also a short drive to the Outlets at Orange, and not out of range for South Coast Plaza.  The continental breakfast was simple but good quality.  There isn't a whole lot around the hotel itself (e.g. restaurants or attractions), but it's a nice quiet stay for a good price. Would be 5 stars if there was anything within walking distance of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us while visiting Disneyland.  We appreciate your positive comments and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel looks brand new. Very modern and elegant styling in the lobby. Convenient access and parking. Very friendly check-in person who gave my kid some small coloring kit. The room was spacious and clean. Breakfast had a decent variety of items (scrambled eggs, sausage, hard-boiled eggs, muffins, bagels, breads, several cereals, yoghurts, etc). This hotel definitely exceeded my expectations and I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing such wonderful comments!  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Had to stay overnight for a business conference.  Free shuttle pickup at airport, very friendly check-in staff, clean and modern looking rooms and a wonderful complimentary breakfast.  Wish I had been able to stay longer but would definitely return.  Also, great value when booked online.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing such positive comments!  Hopefully we can welcome you back soon for a longer stay!

Summary: Not the expected Marriott level of service. Room was not serviced-do not disturb was not left on the door. This was disappointing however even more so was the level of concern when I went to the front desk at 9:30pm to ask for clean towels. No acknowledgement of the service shortfall, no hint of apology or genuine warmth.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your feedback regarding your stay.  I sincerely apologize for the incident that occurred with housekeeping and the resulting inconvenience you experienced.  Please feel free to contact the hotel manager directly at 714-258-9900 so we can discuss further and offer a resolution.  Thank you for choosing Fairfield Inn & Suites!

Summary Heading: Great location for exploring the OC
Summary: Lovely new hotel on the 55 Freeway close to both South Coast Plaza, Disneyland and the beach cities. Friendly, helpful staff. The complimentary breakfast was wonderful. Loved the showers - large with great shower heads. Free parking and a Starbucks next door.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying and sharing such positive feedback!  The showers are also a favorite of mine, so I was happy to hear you enjoyed the experience.  Looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Love the newness of this hotel!
Summary: I stayed here 7 nights this past summer and appreciated the entire customer service and zen-type ambiance.  Cleanliness will always be my #1 hotel preference and this Fairfield Inn & Suites hit it out of the ballpark in all areas/rooms of the hotel.  I appreciated the free parking (with lots of space) and free wi-fi.  The laundry room is spacious and clean.  The fitness center is filled with far more equipment and modern machines than I've seen in higher end hotels.  The breakfast is convenient but I found the hot item selections to be lukewarm and not checked or refilled in a timely manner.  Although I had a "view" of the 55 freeway, I can say that the window did an excellent job of blocking out the non-stop noise. The A/C worked great and it was a treat to actually have two
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us this summer and sharing such terrific comments!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Just what I was looking for
Summary: Clean, quiet, comfortable.  Just what I always want, but rarely find.  Staff was efficient and all were very friendly and helpful - even the ones that don't normally have much public contact.  I had a minor maintenance request which was taken care of promptly and completely.
Manager Response: Happy you were able to find us!  Thank you for your positive comments and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel staff is one of the better ones out of all the marriott brand hotels I have stayed at.   There is free parking and breakfast, a nice touch.   The rooms are always important to me and and had the executive king room which was fantastic. Very clean spacious and enough room for me and my girl to get ready.   The bed itself is fantastic and there is free breakfast.   You won't regret the stay at this one.   Location is huge right off major highways of the 55 and 405
Manager Response: Thank you for staying and sharing such wonderful comments!  We hope you can come back soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 5 days 4 nights while visiting LA/Disney Land. At first I was concerned with the drive to Disney Land from the hotel, but came to find out it was the perfect location. It was close enough for an easy commute to the parks and just far enough away to avoid all the congestion and crowd.   The staff is wonderful and very friendly. The hotel is very clean and the rooms are big.   The daily breakfast was just OK.. to be honest I didn't even try it. My kids would grab a small milk and cereal in the morning.. that was about it.  The location is perfect, it is right off the highway and close to many restaurants and supermarkets. Ask the front desk and they will give directions to almost everything close by. There is a Starbucks and Subways right out the front door...about
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and making us your hotel of choice when visiting Disneyland!  I was happy that our location was convenient and you were pleased with the room and hotel staff.  Hopefully we can welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Taping a TV Commercial in the hotel during my visit
Summary: Ok  This doesn't happen everyday, but there was a professional crew along with actors/actresses taping a commercial for the hotel during my visit.  It was a treat watching how they went about creating the commercial.  It was a bit awkward maneuvering around the set to get to the front desk, but again it doesn't happened all the time.  The staff are very helpful and friendly.  Rooms are large, quiet and the bed provided a wonderful nights sleep.  I usually have a sore back, but certainly not from this bed.  Wish  had checked to see the brand of the mattress.  Complimentary breakfast included eggs, sausages, toast, bagels, an assortment of cereals, juice and fresh fruit.   Of course there was coffee and tea.  Would recommend this hotel which is reasonably close to the John Wayne
Manager Response: We appreciate you sharing your terrific comments and staying with us!   I was happy you were able to see the action that was taking place with the filming - it was very exciting for us!  I also noticed your comment/question about the mattresses at the hotel - the brand we use is Sealy.  Thanks again and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Marriott picked this place for their Fairfield Inn Commercial - for a good reason
Summary: Beautiful, clean and friendly staff...no wonder we spent part of our week's stay in the middle of a commercial shot for Fairfield Inns. Despite the upheaval, everyone from maintenance to kitchen staff to the front desk folks carried on with professionalism and poise, You can see why Marriott wanted to use this hotel as a setting for their commercial - great design, immaculate rooms, and top notch service.  Gabriele, Leslie and Carlos, were among the people who went beyond the call of duty to attend to our needs, and the ladies in the kitchen and housekeeping were lovely. Wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing such wonderful comments!  Being picked as the filming location for the commercial was pretty exciting, and hopefully you were able to see some of the stunts and balancing acts performed by the actors.  We hope to welcome you back to Tustin soon!

Summary: What a great place to stay in the Orange County area!  The property is clean & new!  Great price & free parking.  Convenient to everything!  Starbucks across the parking lot makes it even better!  Rooms are clean & quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for stopping by and sharing your positive feedback!  We hope you can return again soon!

Summary: If you're flying in or out of Santa Ana airport, this new hotel is a great choice for business. The beds are comfortable, the AC keeps the room nice and cool, the rooms are well designed with walk in showers & plenty of outlets, and the staff is friendly. The location is convenient to the airport and the highways, and it's great to walk 100ft to the starbucks in the same parking lot (opens at 4:30am).Top in class for the area!
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing positive comments about your recent stay!  We also provide airport shuttle to and from John Wayne Airport, so keep that in mind if you ever need a lift.  Thanks again, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Have stayed here a couple of times. Hotel is fairly new, so rooms are great, nice amount of parking. Starbucks right next door. The best part is the breakfast that is included, always a large variety and well stocked. My only recommendation is to call for directions, because my navigation takes me down a dead end street, you can see the hotel but have to go miles around to actually get there.
Manager Response: Thank you for being a frequent guest and sharing your comments about the hotel!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Before I retired, I chose to stay at the Fairfield Inn chain as I could always expect a nice environment at a reasonable price. But this hotel was pleasantly above all the others as it, I later learned, was only a year old. You could have fooled me, as the room was immaculate and appeared to have never been used. Another surprise was the enclosed glass shower, which was spotless and again appeared to have never been used. THE ENTIRE ROOM WAS SPOTLESS! As far as traffic noise was concerned, we experienced none. Our encounter with staff was limited, as we checked in late after attending a wedding, but the night clerk appeared friendly enough. Parking was abundant. Having stayed overnight with a late check-in, we had no experience with any of the amenities, but believe it would
Manager Response: Many thanks for staying with us and giving us a double thumbs up!  I was delighted that you were pleasantly surprised by the clean room and glass enclosed shower.  I hope we can welcome you back to our hotel soon!

Summary: Great value for money !!! We loved this hotel - Starting with its great décor, as an interior designer I pay attention to this, and this hotel was very nice. The staff was helpful and nice, breakfast was very good. The pool area was very good. It felt like a 4 star hotel without the prices of one. We've really enjoyed our stay there, and definitely would like to stay there again.  Highly recommended ! I also like that in this type of hotels you have free parking, free wi-fi, complementary breakfast and you don't have to pay for each thing as in the expensive hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments!  I am happy you enjoyed the hotel and amenities, and found value in everything the hotel had to offer.  We hope you return to Fairfield Inn & Suites Tustin again soon!

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff but a few minor fixes needed
Summary: I recently stayed here on vacation with friends. The staff is EXCELLENT. Very friendly and welcoming no matter what time you walk through the lobby doors.  We ordered a pizza for delivery and the front desk called to make sure it was okay to send the driver up to our room, which was thoughtful.   Housekeeping came daily and kept everything in tip top shape. All areas of the hotel were ALWAYS clean and tidy.   My only complaint would be that the beds were rather hard.  It felt like we were sleeping on concrete.  I'm pretty sure the carpet floor would have been softer.  All members of our party have on going back injuries so some nights were more difficult than others.  The bathroom sink also smelt like sewage most mornings which is rather unpleasant to wake up to. Luckily the
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments!  We appreciate the kind words about our front desk and housekeeping staff...they love the feedback!  My apologies for the firm mattress - we hope we can welcome you back when you are in Tustin again.  Thanks!

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for one night and it was excellent. The staff is friendly, the rooms are really spacious, and since the hotel recently opened, they have all new modern finishes and fixtures. There is a free breakfast every morning from 7-10 and it is actually very good. Free wifi in the rooms is also another plus, and the parking on site is free as well. It's conveniently located right on the highway so easy to get in and out from. There is a pool but we didn't get a chance to use it. Overall, I would highly recommend this hotel if looking to stay in the Tustin area.
Manager Response: Many thanks for staying with us and sharing your comments!  I am happy you enjoyed your room and the hotel amenities, even if it was just for 1 night.  Hopefully you can return soon and stay longer so you can try out the pool!  Thanks again!

Summary: Fate has a way of sometimes rewarding you, and this was no exception.  A delay in my travels caused a stayover with an early flight from the John Wayne/Orange County airport.  This new Hotel was just a few miles from the Airport and within easy walking distance to restaurants and shopping.  Only 11 months old, this has the look and feel of a 5-star property with the staff receiving 10 stars from me.  Professional, curteous and willing to go the extra mile for the traveler.  After a very refreshing meal and then comfortable night's sleep, my wakeup call arrived on time and the Hotel-arranged taxi was not only on time, but 5 minutes early.  This Hotel made the logistics of my layover easy and relaxing.  My sincere thanks and highest recommendation go out to this fine property.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing such wonderful comments!  I was delighted that we were able to make your layover and overall travel experience a great one.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in Orange County.  Thanks again!

Summary: Stayed here for one night.  Rooms are exceptionally clean and brand new. Very spacious. Ask for a room away from the freeway with less noise. Nice pool area and free breakfast. There is a Starbucks in the parking lot. You will need to drive to get into downtown Tustin.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing your comments!  I was happy you enjoyed the room and hotel amenities.  Hopefully we can welcome you back again soon!

Summary: I travel frequently and look for business friendly hotels.  The Tustin Fairfield Inn and Suites was very accomodating to me and helped me prep for a big presentation I had to make.  Their buisness center was top notch... the printers, the computers, all working great.  Their staff was helpful and made sure everything went smoothly for my meeting.  They're close to the freeway and the John Wayne Airport..which made it very convienent.
Manager Response: We appreciate your terrific comments and delighted we could assist with your presentation.  We hope we can welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This hotel opened last year (Augest 2013), I remembered staying here on the first day of opening too, it was really new but was missing stuff like the trash cans. But of well, I went back again just a couple of weeks ago and it still looks the same. It's a really clean and new hotel and is a modern hotel. It also has good prices, you can usually find it for $130 or less if you have AAA or any other discount. This hotel has a market that is open 24/7 and offers free breakfast. I love this hotel, it's a nice hotel for a nice price. It also offers a nice pool. This hotel is a hassle if you don't have a car though. I recommend this hotel to everyone that I know. A good hotel for families, if you want a suite, then the next door hotel (Residence Inn) is a better hotel and has better
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for being one of our first guests to stay and one of our biggest fans!  I am elated that you are recommending us to everyone you know - we sincerely appreciate that!  We look forward to welcoming you back again and again!

Summary: A relatively new property which has generous rooms with plenty of room.  They have walk in showers and a great work area for your end of the computer work.  Many places to have a good meal just a short drive away.  For the fast food lovers a Subway and a burger place is right next door.  The breakfast included is just what the business type likes.  The staff is very accommodating and helpful.  Enjoy this hotel when you in the area!
Manager Response: Joseph from South Bend, that's my hometown!  Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your wonderful comments.  I was happy to hear that you were able to stay productive during your business travel.  We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: The best Fairfield Inn you will find!
Summary: One sentence review: This is an new, nicely decorated hotel that is convenient to the beach and Disneyland.  All I can say is wow!  This hotel is at the top of it's game and certainly deserves each of the five-stars.  The location opened in August of last year and features a very trendy design that blended retro and contemporary themes.  Service:  Everyone was very nice!  From check-in to check-out, I was impressed with all the associates and their friendliness.    Housekeeping:  They are at the top of their game.  Being in the hospitality industry, I did check the areas less commonly clean.  The room was spotless from top to bottom and looked brand new.  Breakfast: Yum!  All the great items you would expect from a continental breakfast.  Plus, they add eggs & sausage.  Room:
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing such wonderful comments about your experience.  We take time each day at our daily associate stand-up to share guest feedback, so the entire staff will be thrilled with everything you mentioned.  We sincerely hope we get the opportunity to welcome you back soon!

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this hotel over the memorial day weekend and really had an enjoyable stay. All the rooms have microwaves and small refrigerators. Parking is free and the breakfast is good. The location is central to all of the Orange county locations we wanted to explore. Staff is very courteous and the hotel is very clean.  The gym is just perfect with enough new equipment to get a great workout. Also our room key worked all weekend, we never once had to go to the front desk to get a new key which frequently happens at hotels. We would definitely stay again and again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us over Memorial Day.  We sincerely appreciate your comments about the hotel and staff, and look forward to welcoming you back again and again!  Thanks!

Summary: Our family stayed here on Memorial Day weekend and it was great.  The hotel is still very new and the rooms were all up to date and comfortable.  The reception staff was very nice.  The breakfast was good.  There were many sports teams there:soccer, baseball and swimming, and the hotel seemed to be able to accommodate everyone.  If I were back in Tustin or in that area, I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We really appreciate you staying with us and sharing your terrific comments!  I was delighted that you enjoyed the hotel and staff, and look forward to welcoming you back if you are in the area again.  Thanks!

Summary: Stayed for one night after attending a baseball game in Anaheim.  Got a good AAA rate for 2 queens.  We did have trouble finding the right road, as our map on our iphone led us to a dead end.  We figured it out on our own.  Upon arrival, I noticed everything about the grounds and hotel seemed fresh, new and maintained.  Check in was smooth.  We asked for a quiet room on opposite side of freeway and was given a room on 2nd floor.  Upon entering the room, noted the door was VERY heavy to open.  Room was extremely clean and well furnished.  Looking out the window, we had a horrible view of the rooftop mechanical equipment.  My husband wanted to get a different room, but I was fine with it, since we were really only there to sleep, so we stayed.  Beds were very comfortable with
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and posting such a wonderful review about our hotel!  I am happy you were able to enjoy the room, outdoor area, and amenities, while being close in proximity to the baseball game you attended.  I hope you come back again soon!

Summary: Had 2 days to burn in so cal before I could check into another Marriott property. Gave this a shot due to the location and a friends recommendation. I was very impressed. It is brand spanking new. The room was very nice and comfortable. Staff was great. Breakfast was good. Only complaint was the walls were somewhat thin. Didn't have any issues with neighbors but could definitely hear our neighbor whenever he coughed. Exceeded expectations and would stay here again. Btw SIRI WILL Mis route you so be prepared for that.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending a couple of days with us while in Southern California!  I am thrilled we exceeded your expectations and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Nice new hotel in Orange County
Summary: We've stayed here a couple of different times.  It's a pretty new Fairfield Inn and very nice.  The rooms are comfortable and the breakfast was good.  The hotel is so new that the address may not work with a GPS, so it's a little tricky finding it for the first time.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing your comments!  I am glad you enjoyed the rooms and breakfast.  We hope you make a return trip to Tustin soon!

Summary: My sister and I stayed here for three nights while enjoying a mini vacation in the Anaheim area. We were impressed at the value as the rate was quite cheap.  Room: Clean, the bathroom was big, the beds were comfortable, and it was convenient to have a fridge and microwave. Our room overlooked the freeway, and you could hear traffic, but not enough to affect sleep. The only suggestion I would make to the hotel is that they hang heavier curtains that draw across the entire window. It wasn't quite dark enough, and our room glowed a little bit from the sign. But again, it didn't affect my sleep.  Service: Lovely staff who were so very friendly and helpful. We dealt with three different front desk employees, and all went out of their way to accommodate us.  Location: Right on the
Manager Response: Many thanks for staying with us and sharing your comments!  I was delighted that you enjoyed the rooms and hotel service.  We look forward to welcoming you back for another "mini vacation" soon!

Summary: The front desk agents that helped us check in were so nice! There was a guy named Nathan that gave us directions and recommendations for dinner one night and he was right on with both! Very friendly! Female agent at check out- not so nice. In the middle of us having a conversation with her about payment, she started talking to the lady behind us and then took a phone call- mid sentence-. Upon arrival.. we walked in and the hotel smelled so good and clean! I mentioned it to the agent at check in how awesome the hotel smelled! I was that impressed. The grounds were very nicely kept, the inside of the hotel was very modern and pretty. Our room had a horrible view, but the room itself was fantastic. Very clean, very neat, and very comfy. The bathroom was beautiful. My one and only
Manager Response: Thank you, thank you for such a terrific review!  I will be sure and pass on your comments to Nathan and the rest of the team.  My apologies for the shower pressure - we will take a look at that.  Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here for business and was very impressed with the service, as well as the very modern decoration. Use to corporate type hotels being much less colorful and instead bland, but this place is sparkling brand new and you'd be hard pressed to find a crumb anywhere! Very clean and comfy beds. The complimentary breakfast is great and available for several hours. The outdoors have a firepit, a pool, and a lovely hot tub in again, a very modern setting. Will definitely stay here again. Oh, and the smell of fresh citrus when you walk in will intoxicate you!
Manager Response: We sincerely appreciate you staying with us and sharing your positive comments!  I am happy you enjoyed the services and amenities offered, as well as our modern decor.  We hope to welcome you back to Fairfield Inn Tustin soon!

Summary: This was a very clean property with close proximity to airport, shopping, restaurants, freeways.  They serve a good breakfast(eggs, sausage, oatmeal, coffee, cereal breads) included, and free WiFi was available throughout the property.   There were also some nice outdoor areas by the pool, and some were shaded.  I would definitely recommend this for both business and leisure guests.
Manager Response: We appreciate you staying with us and sharing your comments!  I was delighted to hear that you enjoyed the hotel, amenities, and surrounding area.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Tustin soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights on a business trip.  We had a king studio and it was very comfortable. I wouldn't write home about the breakfast, but there was a fridge and microwave in the room, so we were able to buy things from the excellent Whole Foods Shop down the road and provide for ourselves. As I am gluten free, I did buy some gluten free bread and toasted it in the breakfast room as well, which was great.  I was a bit worried as it is right by the freeway, so thought the traffic may be a problem as we were at the back of the hotel by the freeway, but it did not bother us at all.  When the air con was on, you could not hear the traffic at all.  Cannot comment about staff as didn't see them much, due to the fact I don't like lifts and the only way to access the stairs was from
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments!  I apologize for the temperature in the gym, and will follow up on why they were not able to change it for you.  That is an easy request, so I am sorry you were not able to enjoy your fitness experience.  We hope to welcome you back to the Fairfield Inn & Suites in Tustin soon!

Summary: This was a very clean and well appointed property for the price.  Great breakfast included and the facilities were outstanding.  The location is excellent with easy access to the freeway, restaurants, and the airport.  I would recommend this for both business and leisure guests.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us and sharing comments about your experience!  I am delighted that you enjoyed the hotel location, facilities, and breakfast.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Tustin soon!

Summary: Wow, this was a pleasant surprise. Clean and comfortable, with all the amenities. The free breakfast included fresh fruit, a huge plus, and there's a Starbucks next door if you need a morning latte.  Pool, Hot tub, gym, and business center. The place is new, and really well maintained.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear our hotel was a pleasant surprise!  Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel; improvements in terms of sustainability required
Summary: The hotel makes a very well-maintained/ new impression with very nice and helpful staff. Especially Miguel from the front-desk was very helpful for providing local advise, printing tickets etc.  Pro: - huge, very clean rooms with spacious bathroom - small gym but equipped with all basic machines and free weights - laundry (washing machines and dryers) next to the gym - outdoor pool - free parking and free wifi - free breakfast  Con: - breakfast is very basic (no espresso/ cappuccino/ fresh fruits) - for breakfast only one-time use plates, forks, cups etc. are provided, which produces lots of waste every day and gives the hotel a "cheap" highway motel touch - which it clearly is not. Here the Fairfield should invest in more sustainable/ environment friendly procedures and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to share your comments!  I really appreciate the feedback around our breakfast, and will take this back to team.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Tustin soon!

Summary Heading: Great for a quick stay or for buisness
Summary: This fairfield inn was very modern and fresh! Lovely looking lobby. My check in experience was quick and easy. The front desk lady was so sweet and kind. I wish i would have gotten her name. She was working around 12 noon when i checked in. But anyways i had my son with me and hes heading into the terrible twos and she was so kind and gave him some toys to play with. That genuine customer service i loove! So A+ to her. The rooms are a tad bit small. Im used to staying with Residence inn so these are a step down. If your staying for a quick stay or for buisness the fairfield inn is perfect. If your a family staying on vacation book the residence it can get cramped. But the room was fresh and clean. Bed was comfortable. Bathroom very nice with a beautiful stand in shower. my
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us!  I will be sure and share your comments regarding your fabulous check-in experience to our associate who assisted you.  I was also delighted that you enjoyed many areas of the hotel.  We hope to welcome you and your son back soon!

Summary: I absolutely love Marriott brand hotels. This one definitely did not disappoint.  The room was large, spacious, clean, and functional. I had a great nights sleep every night. The front desk staff were courteous and helpful when I needed assistance locating various things in the area. Breakfast was good in the morning.  Coffee was meh, but there was a Starbucks just outside of the parking lot.  This is why I almost always choose a Marriott brand when traveling on business.  I know what to expect and am always satisfied.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments!  I was delighted that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of the surrounding area...Starbucks seems to be everyone's favorite!  We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We booked one night so we could attend matinee of the Wizard of Oz show in Costa Mesa Segerstrom theater and be near "THE DISTRICT" mall which has Costco, Whole Foods and Target, the divine trinity of eating and shopping! Our room was 425 facing the 55 freeway. This hotel has triple paned windows. We were skeptical but we heard no traffic and got the best sleep on a very very comfortable bed..  The minor bothers were the design of the bathroom door which opens toward the front door=awkward ***should have smaller door or sliding door and they did not have gluten free bread for breakfast as we were used to getting at other Marriott Residence Inns.Otherwise, this 7 month old FAIRFIELD INN is a winner for decor, cleaniless and service,  We especially want to thank Oscar Garcia and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and posting such great comments!  We also appreciate your feedback on the bathroom door and gluten free breakfast.  I will relay your kind words to Oscar and the rest of the team, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This is a rather new property and they are really keeping it up. Great location for in and out and access to the area without any freeway travel required for most places I needed to go. Rooms were perfect and the meeting area was perfect for morning breakfast and other activities during the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and posting your comments!  I am glad you found our location easily accessible and central to where you needed to be.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I'm what you would consider a "hotel snob". This hotel met all my high expectations. The bathroom was clean and grout in shower was clean and taken care of. The location was great considering we were traveling between Anaheim, San Diego and LA. Breakfast was good and had a large variety of foods. However, like other reviews it would be nice to switch up the menu items. Staff was great and helpful. I would suggest staff have access to the milk in the breakfast area... Or offer it in your market. Loved our stay at Fairfield Inn Tustin.
Manager Response: Wow - thank you for the wonderful review!  Happy that you loved the hotel and location.  We also appreciate your feedback on the food offerings, and we will add milk to The Market as an option.  Thanks again for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: I am looking for a "home away from home" where I can stay with my daughter near Tustin, a few nights every other week during the school year.  I was hoping this or the Residence Inn next door might be it.  Unfortunately, I waited until the last minute to book and found the rates to be higher than when I was originally looking at the hotel.  We arrived just after 3pm, which is the check in time listed, and our room was not ready.  The young man at the front desk was very apologetic and tried to get housekeeping to have a room ready ASAP.  It took approximately a half hour before we had a room.  When we did get our room, there were no washclothes.  The breakfast area was very nice with lots of options.    I will probably check out some of the other local properties, even though
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments.  My apologies for the delay with your check-in.   I know your time is valuable and waiting for a room can be a frustrating experience.  I was happy you enjoyed the breakfast and I hope we can see you again soon.  Thanks again for choosing Fairfield Inn and Suites in Tustin!

Summary Heading: New hotel needs to improve its customer service!
Summary: The hotel is clean. The breakfast was good, it did get old after eating the same thing for 6 days! Customer service is where they need help! We had 4 registered guests in our room. They would only leave us 3 towels daily. We would call and they would tell us we would have to come down for more towels. Shouldn't they deliver them to their guests? One day housekeeping skipped our room. Person at the front desk pretty much said it was our fault. I'm not sure how it was my fault when I was gone all day. When we called down we were told we could come down for towels but there wasn't anything he could do about it. When we went to get the towels he would only give us 3. I asked for one more since there was 4 of us and was refused one. He told me he was only allowed to give out 3 towels
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  My sincere apologies for the issues you experienced with the towels.  Oscar Garcia, our Assistant General Manager, was the manager you originally spoke with and will be sending you a follow up email regarding this matter.  Again, thank you for staying with us and we hope you will give us another try on your next trip to Tustin.

Summary: My family of 4 stayed here for 5 nights.  The desk staff were all very friendly.  Rooms were spacious and beds were nice and soft.  We had two queen beds.  There is a small snack area by the front desk where you can purchase snacks 24 hours. Enjoyed the breakfast in the morning in a large eating area.  There were several options including scrambled eggs, sausage, bagels, muffins, oatmeal, fruit, yogurt, juice and coffee.  My only suggestion would be that you add a little more variety to the main breakfast items.   Staying here 5 nights...the eggs and sausage can get old.  Hotel was quiet.  One complaint I had was every night I had to go down to the front desk and ask for a 4th towel for our room.  Housekeeping would only leave three.  Each time I would ask if they could notify
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us for 5 nights and sharing comments about your experience!  My apologies for the missing 4th towel - I will share your feedback with the front desk and housekeeping.  I'm delighted you enjoyed our location - The Flame Broiler just opened this week (next to Subway), so be sure and check it out.  Thanks again and hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights. It opened several months ago so everything was new and clean. We had the two bed Suite which was nice in that it had a seating area with a sofa and two TV's. There was also a work desk and a small partial divider wall. The breakfast was very good with Oatmeal, Scrambled Eggs, Sausage, Yogurt, Milk/Juices, Cereals, various breads, either Cantelope or Bananas. The only complaint I have is that they never change things up with the breakfast. It is virtually the same thing day after day. The other issue I saw here was that they NEVER vacuum the hallways or stairways. There was the same clump of dirt on the stairway the whole five days I stayed there. If you look closely at the hallway carpets, there is tiny pieces of lint/dirt/garbage all over. The
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your comments!  I am happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast and your 2-bed suite.  My apologies for the issue with the hallway carpet, and I will pass along your feedback to housekeeping.  Thanks again for choosing Fairfield Inn & Suites Tustin, and we hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Nice, new hotel, suited for business travelers
Summary: I wish we'd had more time at this brand new property.  We didn't get to the property until about 9 pm.  The service was friendly and efficient.  My husband had a business meeting in Tustin early the next morning, so the location was ideal.  It was situated next to the off-ramp and the highway, but the room was pretty quiet -- just a low hum.    Some Fairfields are pretty dumpy and are on par with a Motel 6 -- not so with these new-styled Fairfields.  Everything looked modern and had ample space for working (desk, computer hook ups, microwave, small frig).  The breakast was heartier than I remember most Fairfield's -- there was eggs and meat (along with the typical yogurt, cereals, breads, etc.).    We'll be back.
Manager Response: We wish you had more time at our hotel, also!  Thank you for the wonderful review and the comments regarding the modern design and amenities.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon, and for a longer stay!

Summary: Had the chance to stay here twice in recent months and this is a very welcome addtion to the area and very much planning on staying here again. Great taff and very friendly and make your stay great as well. Good front desk team and overall cant wait to stay there again.
Manager Response: And we can’t wait to have you back! Thank you for you for spreading the word about our property. I’ll definitely tell the team to keep up the great work for your next arrival!

Summary: Marriott has managed to change the image of the Fairfield Inn Brand. This hotel has everything you need:  Several Outlets for your gadgets Nice size rooms- with very quiet PTACS Ample desk space Microwaves and Refrigerators Large bathrooms Great Shower heads  Why did I not give it 5 stars??  A few reasons:  Bathroom door shutting automatically is annoying The sausage at breakfast- typical pork sausage patty. Spice it up, get healthier and try turkey links No express check out given under my door- had to go to the front desk to get a receipt  Overall, very nice hotel and planned well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much! Yes, this is it! We’ve freshened up, simplified, and gone back to the basics. Glad you approve!  For breakfast, this is our new breakfast program as far as the hot items go. I can definitely pass up your thoughts and suggestions. And as for your express checkout… there are several reasons why we’ve stop slipping them under the doors. Typically we recommend emails to be put on reservations so that they are sent via email. This seems to be the most secure (and easiest to find) option for many.  Regardless, thanks again for your feedback, and of course, for staying with us!

Summary: This Fairfield is 3 months old and a couple of miles from John Wayne Airport.  It's a large property - very beautiful and modern inside. Things I really appreciate: - Nice Gym - Lots of plugs throughout the room - Real hairdryer - Good coffee maker - Decent free breakfast - Reasonable rate (approx. $149) - Friendly helpful staff The rooms are a decent size and so comfortable.  There is a new shopping center next door that has an open Starbucks.  A FedEx, Subway and a couple of other restaurants will open in the next few months.  If you have a car, there are plenty of restaurants within a mile.  As long as the rates stay reasonable, this will be my go to hotel when in this area.
Manager Response: Hello! Yes, this the NEW Fairfield. Our property is one of the newest in the brand and all of those features you mentioned are what we’re all about. Glad you were able to stop in and experience our latest efforts. We appreciate you as a guest and your valuable feedback. Until next time!

Summary Heading: 4 star hotel and I'm here 3-4 times a month.
Summary: I used to stay at the Courtyard on the corner of Jamboree and Main but it's $50/night more expensive and they charge you for breakfast. Fairfield Inn offers a light but free breakfast and this particular hotel is brand spanking new. The desk staff is always friendly, professional and helpful. This is definitely a business person's hotel, not for the kiddies. In fact if you want to bring your kids here, please don't!
Manager Response: Welcome to the neighborhood! And thank you so much for your kind words! We are not only glad to have you as a new customer but elated that our services meet your needs. If you have any questions or comments, please feel free to let me know. We look forward to seeing you again!    By the way…those kids tend to find their way over to the Residence Inn. Send them on over!

Summary Heading: Unexpected Fairfield, great facility, great staff, decent location
Summary: We came to the Fairfield Tustin because it had a reasonable price and we planned to stay a night and move on.. Upon arriving to this Fairfield it turned out to be a brand new hotel. Looking pretty good. The staff were friendly and very helpful. Our room was not that of a normal old Fairfield, it was spacious, clean and comfortable. Usually I use Fairfield's for a place to sleep for cheap. Not this one. We extended the stay twice. Ashley at the front desk was extremely friendly and helpful. Really made us feel as if we were staying at a Full Service Marriott..  For a Fairfield this location will make any traveler happy.
Manager Response: We LOVE exceeding expectations!  As you have seen, our associates work very hard to ensure excellent stays and I could not be happier that you decided to stop in, and more so, that you liked what you saw.  Thanks again for your comments!

Summary: Full disclosure - I'm a Marriott fan, Platinum Level and Vacation weeks owner.  I travel regularly to Orange County for business and at times it's very difficult to find a good quality and affordable hotel in the area.  This new Fairfield Inn is more like a Courtyard in regards to amenities, decor and rooms - only thing missing is the new bistros that Courtyard had been implementing.      Ideal location as it sits right off the 55 and situated between the 5 and the 405 - minutes away from SNA and a quick drive to the beaches or Disneyland.  Nothing is in walking distance other than a Starbucks in the shared parking lot with the Residence Inn which is also new, but plenty of restaurants nearby both corporate and locally owned.  If you like Japanese, try Honda-ya which is an
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and recommendations!  We have a few more eateries coming soon, including a Flame Broiler...so hopefully we will see you again soon!

Summary: My sister and new brother-in-law came to visit my family in Tustin and of course being newlyweds wanted their own hotel room during their stay. When they asked me what hotels were in the area, up until recently I would have told them the best hotels are near Disneyland, the airport or the beach, but then I remembered this pair of brand new Marriott hotels built right off the 55 Freeway here in Tustin. They decided on the Fairfield Inn where we visited several times during their stay and I must admit I was impressed. It was beautifully decorated and the staff couldn't have been more courteous or helpful. My sister and new husband loved the place, but said the surrounding area seemed a bit isolated with only a few nearby restaurants. However, one is a favorite of mine, the Citrus
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Exceptional guest services at a consistant Marriott property!
Summary: I stayed with my parents at this property as my parents were visiting Orange County. Every encounter with the staffs in this hotel, I was greeted with a smile and warm welcome. Melissa at the front desk really went above and beyond for my parents. She was very courteous and patient with my parents, whom barely speaks enlgish, in giving directions to the South Coast Plaza and the local attractions. She was knowledgeable of the local area and even gave us a turn by turn direction to the nearby coffee bean. Also this property had the consistent look of a marriott hotel with 5 star guest services. At this point, there arent much restaurants around but few stores are coming in next door so that should definitely suffice. Price of a 3 star hotel with complimentary internet, parking,
Manager Response: none

Summary: Avoid at all costs.  Rude, inexperienced staff.  Absolutely terrible service and woke me up to tell me there was too much noise in my room while I was sleeping.  Manager proceeded to argue with me but promised me Marriott points as an apology.  This place is the worst Marriott in the US.  The rooms smell as well.  Go with Hilton - can't go wrong.   If you walk or breathe in your room, they said that you are making too much noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments regarding your stay.  I am very sorry you did not have a pleasant experience.  We strive to exceed our guest's expectations, so I apologize that this was not the case.  We hope you can give us another try and we can welcome you back soon.

Summary: Our family stayed 7 nights during a sporting event. I was very happy with the friendliness of the staff. We were greeted with a smile every day, the breakfast staff in particular was eager to please and worked very hard. Rooms were spacious and modern. Decor is contemporary and attractive. Very nicely designed. Pool, hot tub, exercise room were all new and quite nice. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here for a business trip a few weeks ago and while the hotel is nice, very clean and definitely great value there is very little to do nearby.  I had to venture quite far to eat or find anything to do in the evening.  I definitely recommend this place for the cleanliness and the newer feel of it, however, next time I'm in this area I will probably look for a different place to stay that's more centrally located or at least has some restaurants nearby.  Because this is a new hotel it will be interesting to see if they can continue the cleanliness of the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I love new hotels especially when done in contemporary and modern style and with the consistency of Marriott hotels.  This hotel has just opened this month along with its sister the Residence Inn across the parking lot. Everything about the hotel is top notch for its brand and the price. Great gym equipment, pool, lobby, laundry, etc. And the hallways and rooms are amazing.  Very well done in bright but subtle colors against dark wood features.   The bathrooms are spacious with very good water pressure and lighting. The beds were heavenly comfortable.  They've placed the hotels smartly in an up and coming someone lonely stretch of the street/area but they will be the foundation for some new things to the area. A YardHouse Restaurant/Bar would be amazing in this areas and Orange
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very nice new mid-level hotel in Tustin
Summary: I love staying in new or recently renovated hotels/motels, and I've enjoyed my stays in Marriott hotels.  We were fortunate to discover this new hotel while looking for a place to stay near LA and believed it would be a treat for us, given our need to stay at simpler, more affordable accommodations in recent years.
